entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AssemblyName.exe.withSupportedRuntime.config files generated after migration to SDK style projects #27114
  • Breakage with workload installation in SDK 6.0.400 #27109
  • .Net (DotNet) tests get stuck with no reported errors or warning and I could not find the cause on Gitlab Runner's Kubernetes executor #27106
  • dotnet workload install wasm-tools failed on docker #27094

Closed

  • "The application 'run' does not exist" after updating to 6.0.8 on Ubuntu 22.04 #27097
  • Changes to bring templates into SDK introduces source-build prebuilts #27089
  • [Ubuntu 22.04] dotnet doesn't find installed SDKs #27082
  • 'dotnet new list' crashes for x64 SDK installed on Windows ARM64 #27032
    7.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Re-run tests for linker integration #27113
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Backport Razor Static Web Assets Manifest Path Changes #27108
    Area-AspNetCore, 6.0.4xx
  • Cleanup yaml #27105
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Include templating in source-build #27107
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Allow customizing the static web assets base manifest paths if defined by the environment #27102
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Adding support for VS Designtime targets for worker projects #27087
    Area-WebSDK
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1936874 #27043
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix templating to be source-buildable #27091
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Templates] marked template packages as shipping #27083
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix registry redirection #27095
    Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #27072
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove SystemInformation dependency #27090
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Handle error when status runtime information cannot find version in productCollection. #26676
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fixed restore when running local builds. #27018
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Parser for actual msbuild property syntax #27086
    Bug, Area-CLI
  • Update minimum msbuild for RC1 #26872
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Get PublishRelease and PackRelease working in .*proj, Solutions #26808
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx
  • [dotnet new] telemetry for MSBuild evaluation #27042
    Area-Infrastructure
  • `dotnet-new`: dotnet post-actions are moved to `dotnet` project #27039
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #27071
    Area-Infrastructure
